casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana v. Bruce BOSLEY. No. 98-K-1637. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Nov. 6, 1998.

Prior report: La.App.,-So.2d-.

In re Bosley, Bruce; — Defendant(s); applying for writ of certiorari and/or review; Parish of Iberville, 18th Judicial District Court, Div. “C”, No. 1819-94; to the Court of Appeal, First Circuit, No. KA97 0307.

Denied.

LEMMON, J., not on panel.
